metadata.title: CVE-2023-1248 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in OTRS AG OTRS (Ticket Actionsmodules), OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition (Ticket Actions modules)allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects OTRS: from 7.0.Xbefore 7.0.42; ((OTRS)) Community Edition: from 6.0.1 through 6.0.34.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
